We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private MeanAbsoluteDeviation _mad;
// In Initialize()
_mad = MAD(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_mad.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "MAD Mean", _mad.Mean);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MAD Period", _mad.Period);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MAD Current", _mad.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
self.mad = self.MAD(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.mad.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MAD Mean", self.mad.Mean);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MAD Period", self.mad.Period);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MAD Current", self.mad.Current);
